name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Melvin E. WILKERSON, Jr., Appellant

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Melvin E. WILKERSON, Jr., Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
Justice ZAPPALA and NIGRO dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Holly Feeney Morris, Public Defender’s Office, for Melvin E. Wilkerson, Jr.
Francis T. Chardo, Sr., Edward M. Marlsico, Jr., Dist. Atty., Dist. Attorney’s Office, for Com.
casebody.head_matter:
750 A.2d 842
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Melvin E. WILKERSON, Jr., Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 3, 2000.
Decided May 19, 2000.
Holly Feeney Morris, Public Defender’s Office, for Melvin E. Wilkerson, Jr.
Francis T. Chardo, Sr., Edward M. Marlsico, Jr., Dist. Atty., Dist. Attorney’s Office, for Com.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
